description: Flash-X is a highly composable multiphysics software system that can be used to simulate physical phenomena in several scientific domains. It is derived from FLASH, which has been a community code for several communities over the last 20 years. The Flash-X architecture has been redesigned to be compatible with increasingly heterogeneous hardware platforms. A part of the redesign is a utilizing a newly designed performance portability layer that is language agnostic.
name: Flash-X
